title: Just had a game  all the players lagged
body:
hi I played a game afew mins ago and all the players lagged for like 1o min  and the internet was fine
  after that we could play for 5 min and the game crashed  and I dunno what happened after that    I'm in euw  can someone tell me what happned  ( sorry for my bad English and the problem isn't on my pc or the enemy pc )

replies.body: Can you provide me a link to the match so I can take a look and check for any issues on the server? Additionally, when you say "lag" do you mean delays in what you're seeing on the screen or any popups saying "attempting to reconnect?" With a bit more info, I can help you further.
